package.name: marimbabot_speech
package.description: The marimbabot_speech package is designed to recognize and extract the command from the human voice, and also speech synthesis. It consists of the following nodes: - audio_capture: capture audio from microphone (from ros audio_common package) - speech_tmp_node: convert audio to temporary file - speech_stt_node: recognize speech from audio file - speech_ttc_node: convert text to command - speech_tts_node: convert text to speech
